document.full_text: los angeles angels first baseman kendrys morales will begin the season on the disabled list recovering from the leg injury he suffered last year while celebrating a game-winning home run.
document.title: angels' morales to start season on disabled list
lines_and_colors: los angeles angels first baseman kendrys morales will begin the season on the disabled list recovering from the leg injury he suffered last year while celebrating a game-winning home run.
